    • Motel

  • public class Motel
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Motel motel
      We want to make sure only 1 motel is created
      private java.util.ArrayList<Room> occupiedRooms
      Whatever room is occupied will be removed from the room list and added to the occupied rooms
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> rooms
      Our motel will have n amount of available rooms

        Create n amount of rooms for the motel

      • checkIn

        public Room checkIn(RoachColony colony,
                    java.lang.String roomType,
                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> amenities)
        This method will allow a roach colony to check into a room, along with any amenities they would like to add
        Parameters:
        colony - the roach colony to check in
        roomType - one of the 3 types of rooms the colony chooses: Regular, Deluxe, or Suite
        amenities - the list of amenities the colony desire to have in their room
        Returns:
        the room created for the roach colony

      • checkOut

        public void checkOut(Room r,
                     int days,
                     PaymentStrategy paymentType)
        This method allows a colony to check out of their rooms, paying with their type for however many days they stayed
        Parameters:
        r - the room to be checked out of
        days - the amount of days stayed in the room
        paymentType - one of the 2 types of payment to use: RoachPal or MasterRoach
